title: Pak-Afghan tensions: Islamabad says truce talks collapse; fate of ceasefire unclear
description: Pakistan's defence minister has declared talks with Afghanistan have effectively collapsed. This comes after negotiators failed to bridge significant gaps. Weeks of border fighting have led to casualties on both sides. Qatar mediated a ceasefire, but sporadic clashes continue. The long-standing dispute over the Durand Line border remains a core issue.

description: The stampede at Sri Venkateswara Swamy temple in Kasibugga on November 1, is the deadliest of its kind this year, claiming nine lives. Brought about by a combination of poor judgement, social media hype and hollow safeguards, the tragedy lays bare glaring holes in crowd management at temples in Andhra Pradesh, writes Hareesh P.

title: U.S. military to establish presence at Damascus airbase, sources say

Vocational training is expected to gain prominence.

title: Over 59% of unrecognised political parties linked to Bihar failed to disclose finances: ADR

title: 'Mamu Gang' mastermind arrested: Delhi Police nab fruit seller who led bank robberies
description: Delhi Police Crime Branch has arrested Kamrul alias Mamu, a 51-year-old fruit seller, who masterminded the "Mamu Gang" involved in interstate bank burglaries. Posing as a humble vendor by day, he meticulously planned heists, striking at night with precision to disable alarms and break into vaults. His arrest has solved three major bank burglary cases in Karnataka.

Gandhi claims this exposes corruption and that the government came to power through vote theft.

She then applied to fewer, more focused programs, securing admission to the University of Chicago. Her experience highlights the importance of deliberate choices, proactive engagement, and building genuine connections for academic and personal growth.

title: Elon Musk: Teach critical thinking to kids; why it matters
description: Critical thinking, not rote memorization, is vital for children's development, as highlighted by Elon Musk. Research shows that fostering curiosity, play, and exploration significantly boosts problem-solving and cognitive flexibility. Schools globally lag in teaching these essential skills, which empower kids to discern truth, make sound decisions, and navigate a complex world, ultimately becoming a lifelong superpower.

title: 'US has enough nuclear to blow up world 150 times': Trump says 'we are number 1'; ranks world powers
description: President Trump reiterated his claim of having enough nuclear weapons to "blow up the world 150 times," emphasizing his goal of denuclearization. He stated that the U.S. leads in nuclear capabilities, followed by Russia and China, and suggested leaders like Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin would redirect funds from weapons programs. Trump also confirmed the U.S.

title: How chaos at Mumbai's CMST forced commuters onto tracks; 2 killed by local train
description: Mumbai's Central Railway faced severe disruption as a railway employee protest at CSMT led to overcrowded platforms and stalled trains. Commuters, desperate to get home, walked on tracks near Sandhurst Road, resulting in a tragic accident where two died and three were injured. The protest stemmed from an FIR against engineers in a prior fatal accident.

title: Ford CEO questions Apple’s CarPlay: Warns of overreach; questions Tim Cook
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley expressed strong concerns about Apple's CarPlay Ultra, fearing it encroaches too deeply into vehicle control. He questioned how far Apple's brand should extend into car functions, emphasizing the digital experience as a key differentiator for future vehicles. This follows similar reservations from other automakers and GM's decision to drop both CarPlay and Android Auto.

title: Google’s AI investment: Company may bet ‘big’ on Anthropic; equalise fight with OpenAI
description: Google is reportedly in early discussions for a major investment in Anthropic. This move escalates the global AI race, putting pressure on Microsoft-backed OpenAI. The potential funding could value Anthropic at over $350 billion. Google's strategic push aims to provide Anthropic with crucial resources to compete effectively in the evolving AI landscape.

title: Sidney Crosby future: GM Kyle Dubas makes firm call on Penguins captain
description: Pittsburgh Penguins GM Kyle Dubas has definitively stated that captain Sidney Crosby's future remains with the team. Dubas emphasized his commitment to building a contending roster around Crosby, with no plans to trade the veteran.  He believes continued success and winning are the best solutions for the team's long-term vision.

title: Gisele Bündchen says prioritizing Tom Brady took a toll: “Love isn’t a jail
description: Supermodel Gisele Bündchen, in a candid interview, shared insights into her marriage with Tom Brady, describing their split as a 'death and rebirth.' She detailed her journey of shifting from supporting her partner's career to rediscovering her own dreams and defining personal success. Bündchen emphasizes her graciousness towards Brady, highlighting her focus on authenticity and fulfillment in her new chapter.
